intro: Lastrea microstegia, commonly known as the small-stemmed lastrea, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, which is known for its unique adaptations to arid environments. The plant features small, fleshy leaves that store water, allowing it to survive in dry conditions. Its flowers are typically small and yellow, blooming during the warmer months. It is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its compact size and attractive foliage.
